instructions.instruction: THE FOLLOWING DOCUMENT IS DIVIDED INTO TWO SECTIONS. SECTION ONE CONTAINS THE PROJECT DESCRIPTIONS AND SPECIFICATIONS FROM SECTION TWO SHOULD BE COMPLETED BY THE RESEARCH AGENCY AND RETURNED BY FAX TO THE FOLLOWING PERSON: MS.S.L.NILLINGER, B89, LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY, USA, FAX NUMBER 1-502-568-7187

IN ORDER TO ALLOW US TO COMPARE BIDS WE REQUEST THAT YOU SUBMIT A BID FOR THE RESEARCH AS SPECIFIED IN SECTION ONE. SUGGESTIONS FOR ALTERNATE DESIGNS FROM THE AGENCY ARE WELCOMED. HOWEVER THESE SHOULD BE SUBMITTED AS SEPARATE DOCUMENTS APPENDED TO THIS BID FORM.
IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE CONTACT THE FOLLOWING PERSON: MARY DAVIS, FAX NUMBER: 1-502-568-8092
